A list of useful resources and related initatives:

* The [visR initative](https://openpharma.github.com/visR).
* A [Rstudio Rviews webinar](https://resources.rstudio.com/webinars/effective-visualizations-for-data-driven-decisions) on graphics principles and visR
* PSI special interest group on [visualisation](https://www.psiweb.org/sigs-special-interest-groups/visualisation).
* The [xGx](https://opensource.nibr.com/xgx/) initative from Novartis PMX.
* The [CTSpedia](https://www.ctspedia.org/do/view/CTSpedia) initative. 

## Corrections or questions {.appendix}

If you see mistakes, want to suggest changes or ask us a question, please [create an issue](https://github.com/GraphicsPrinciples/GraphicsPrinciples.github.io/issues) on the source repository or [email directly](mailto:bailliem@gmail.com)
